title: Please help me get out of broze 5
body: guyz i ned help getting ot of bronze 5, also how do you play master yi? I alwayz get executed by wolf kamp{{champion:11}}

replies.body: get Q 1st start with machete and health pots get a leash and kill toad 1st for the dot then easy
Don't know if joke or real.

Not sure if the wolf thing is real, but he is in Bronze.
Man Ive been helping all the bronzes today.
